EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify users that Annual Survey is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Currency Center Annual Survey Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: IATA Annual Survey Submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name}
We would like to thank you for participating in the RFB Survey.
You will find attached the RFB Report {!YEAR(TODAY())} with the industry findings and focus for this yearâ€™s advocacy efforts for currency repatriation.
We will continue to engage with our Members facing repatriation issues on a monthly basis to keep track of the progress and development and support the advocacy actions.
Should you have any queries, please log a case in your IATA Customer portal under the topic ""Currency Center""
Kind regards, Currency Center Team.
